name: Soul of Noire
description:
In this game you play as an evil sorceress who has locked up hostages in her dungeon. Don't let any of the hostages escape otherwise they'll call a Law Enforcer!

How to play:

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

Compatible resolutions (16:9):

1600x900
1366x768
1360x768
1280x720
1024x600

Team:

Culminate - Programmer

https://www.instagram.com/magykalmystique/ - Artist

https://soundcloud.com/oniwaka/tracks - Musician
